author: , Fort Collins Coloradoan
title: Tucker Carlson compares Donald Trump to 'dad' who will deliver 'vigorous spanking' if elected
text: Former Fox News host Tucker Carlson riled up the crowd at a Georgia rally for former President Donald Trump Wednesday with an unusual metaphor. The long-divisive conservative political commentator compared Trump to a “pissed” father. He said in the case Trump is reelected on Nov. 5. and returns to the White House next year, it will be as if he is coming home to punish his misbehaving daughter, the country. “He’s not vengeful. He loves his children, disobedient as they may be,” Carlson said. “When dad comes home, you know what he says? ‘You’ve been a bad girl. You’ve been a bad little girl and you’re getting a vigorous spanking right now.’” More: Election 2024 live updates: Trump, Harris close in swing state polls; Beyoncé joins Harris He also said that, when the country is led by Democrats, it's like a child allowed to “smear the contents of his diapers on the wall of your living room,” or a “hormone-addled 15-year-old daughter” who makes rude gestures at her parents. Carlson’s comments quickly drew criticism online from Democrats. Former White House Communications Director Kate Bedingfield responded to a clip of Carlson's metaphor on X writing , "what the actual..." and James Singer, a spokesperson for the Kamala Harris campaign, called Carlson's comments "weird" using an expletive. Later, when Trump took the stage at the Duluth campaign stop, members of the audience chanted “Daddy’s home.” Trump used the appearance as an opportunity to celebrate the state's record early voter turnout and its potential swing-state impact. As the host of “Tucker Carlson Tonight” on Fox News, Carlson was one of the network's biggest stars. The show was canceled last year following a series of controversies . Carlson drove ratings at the network but, his critics say he pushed extreme right-wing views and trafficked in racist and misogynistic themes and conspiracy theories. Savannah Kuchar contributed to this report. Reach Rachel Barber at rbarber@usatoday.com and follow her on X @rachelbarber_

author: Ernesto Jiménez
title: Caen dos choferes de autobús que transportaban 30 kilos de fentanilo y heroína por Sinaloa - Infobae
text:
Choferes de autobús detenidos con 30 kilos de fentanilo Personal de la Fiscalía General de la República (FGR) detuvo a dos choferes de autobús de pasajeros que circulaban por la Carretera internacional México 15 con un cargamento de 30 kilos en fentanilo y heroína.
Ambos sujetos fueron capturados en el tramo que conecta las ciudades de Los Mochis y Navojoa ; su destino final sería la frontera de Sonora con Arizona.
De acuerdo con información divulgada por la FGR, los detenidos responden a los nombres de Marlon “N” y Cristian Iván “N”, quienes viajaban en un autobús de la línea Tufesa, marcado con el número de serie 592.
Au camión fue retenido en un punto de control provisional instalado en el kilómetro 49+250; al inspeccionarlo, los agentes de seguridad encontraron 17 paquetes de fentanilo en polvo, de un kilo cada unos; 7 mil pastillas de fentanilo color azul; y 5 kilos de una sustancia granulada y de color oscuro , características propias de la heroína.
De manera preliminar se reportó que fue una llamada anónima la que alertó a las autoridades sobre el cargamento que pasaría por la carretera que cruza El Poblado Cinco, perteneciente a la sindicatura Villa Gustavo Díaz Ordaz, en el municipio de Ahome.
La droga y los detenidos quedaron bajo la custodia del ministerio Público Federal, Policía Federal Ministerial y de la Agencia de Investigación Criminal (AIC), según reportó la FGR.
Fentanilo decomisado en carretera de Sinaloa A proceso por transportan 9 mil píldoras de fentanilo En otros hechos, la FGR informó sobre la vinculación a proceso de una persona que fue detenido en posesión de 9 mil pastillas de fentanilo.
La detención de Adrián “C”, informó la FGR, se efectuó en días anteriores y se le fincaron cargos por su probable responsabilidad en delitos contra la salud, en su modalidad de posesión con fines de transporte de fentanilo.
“De acuerdo con la carpeta de investigación, Adrián “C”, se encontraba a bordo de un vehículo en la carretera México 15, tramo Los Mochis-Navojoa, en Los Mochis, Ahome, y al percatarse de la presencia policial intentó ocultar una bolsa de plástico transparente que contenía pastillas de color azul. Al realizar una revisión, las autoridades detectaron en el asiento del copiloto la bolsa con nueve mil 130 tabletas M-30, que dieron un peso de un kilo 95 gramos seis miligramos de fentanilo”. Con estos dos aseguramientos en una semana, las autoridades federales y estatales afirmaron que se dio un duro golpe al crimen organizado que opera en Sinaloa y que continúa utilizando la ruta de Sonora para enviar narcóticos a los Estados Unidos.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes

title: Homeless struggle through harsh chilly nights despite shelter homes in Ranchi - Times of India
text: Ranchi: As winter tightens its grip on the state capital, many homeless individuals continue to brave the freezing nights on roads despite the availability of govt night shelter homes. A lack of awareness and misconceptions about the facilities are significant barriers preventing their use.The Ranchi Municipal Corporation (RMC) operates 10 night shelter homes across the city, including Khadgarha Bus Stand (separate facilities for men and women), Dhurwa Bus Stand, and Bakri Bazar. The Bakri Bazar shelter home, with a capacity of 10 beds, often sees double occupancy during biting winters.Rickshaw pullers are among those who avoid night shelter homes due to misleading information. The winter season accentuates the struggles of the homeless, with misconceptions and limited outreach hindering the effective utilization of resources. Many take refuge at railway stations or under flyovers instead of safer options.Gajdhari Mahto, a rickshaw puller at Albert Ekka Chowk, said, \"I didn't know about these night shelter homes. During cold nights, I often sleep at the Ranchi railway station bridge or underneath it.\"Ramesh Birua, another rickshaw puller, said, \"I thought charges would be taken at the night shelter homes, so I prefer sleeping in my rickshaw with blankets.\"RMC's commitment to improving awareness and increasing capacity aims to ensure no one has to face the chilling cold nights on Ranchi's streets.Nikesh Kumar, RMC's assistant municipal commissioner, highlighted ongoing efforts to aid the homeless. \"Our teams are on the field daily, rescuing the homeless and beggars. We distribute blankets and ensure that the shelter facilities are utilized. Additionally, we are planning to establish temporary shelter homes at prominent locations to accommodate more people.\"

author: Jeff Zillgitt USA TODAY
title: Dwyane Wade reveals shocking cancer diagnosis, kidney surgery
text:
NBA Hall of Famer Dwyane Wade reveals shocking cancer diagnosis and partial kidney removal Jeff Zillgitt USA TODAY Show Caption
Hide Caption
The NBA's most surprising teams so far Which team has shocked the league so far? The For The Hoops crew make their picks for most surprising team here! Dwyane Wade had a cancerous tumor removed from his right kidney 13 months ago, the former NBA star revealed on his podcast.
Wade said doctors removed 40% of his right kidney on Dec. 18, 2023.
“My own journey to have that surgery, I think it was the first time that my family, my dad, my kids, they saw me weak,” Wade said on The Why with Dwyane Wade . “That moment was probably the weakest point I’ve ever felt in my life.”
Wade said he had been putting off a physical but health concerns, including urinary issues, prompted a visit to a physician.
Wade, 43, explained that the area of concern could not be biopsied so he had surgery to remove the tumor.
“I had a personal decision to make, and what it was was, ‘If this is cancerous, if this tumor, this cyst is cancerous, on your kidney, you’re 41 years old, you probably need surgery because it's something that needs to be removed so it doesn’t spread,’ ” Wade says.
Following surgery, the tumor was biopsied and found to be cancerous.
“What I saw in the midst of me going through my illness, I saw my family that may not always talk, may not always agree," Wade said on the podcast. "I saw everybody show up for me and be there for me and in that process, in my weakness I found strength in my family.”
Wade, who is married to Gabrielle Union, won three titles with the Miami Heat and was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2023 . He averaged 22.0 points, 5.4 assists, 4.7 rebounds and 1.5 steals and shot 48% from the field in his 16-year career.
Following his NBA career, Wade has been involved in entertainment production, broadcasting, podcasting and he is a partial owner of the Utah Jazz.
Follow NBA reporter Jeff Zillgitt on social media @JeffZillgitt

author: El Sol
title: Mario Abed evaluó los daños por la tormenta en Junín: "Fue como un hongo en el cielo"
text:
El intendente Mario Abed aseguró que la tormenta que se abatió sobre el departamento de Junín en la tarde de este miércoles fue “ distinta a la que estamos acostumbrados ” y remarcó que, con el pasar de los días, se verán los daños que la inestabilidad, más otros factores, causaron en las vides y otros cultivos de esa zona del Este.
Abed explicó en Noticiero 9 que la inestabilidad comenzó como “ una situación que a las 4 de la tarde se veía una tormenta rara “. Y también se refirió a las imágenes de la colosal nube granicera que se formó en ese sector del Este provincial. “ La seguíamos por el radar y veíamos cómo se producía como un hongo sobre el cielo. Era una tormenta difícil “, graficó.
“ Tenía todas las características de una tormenta distinta a las que estamos acostumbrados “, consideró.
Este es uno de los videos que se viralizó en las redes sociales este miércoles sobre la nube granicera que se descargó con todo sobre Junín .
El alcalde radical detalló que el fenómeno de viento, fuertes ráfagas y piedra recorrió las localidades de Medrano, luego Rodríguez Peña y finalmente la ciudad de Junín.
“ Tenemos el 93% cultivado, ha castigado a nuestros viñedos y al ser huracanado ha producido daños en las vides de todos lados “, expuso Abed, pero pronóstico que, en combinación con otros fenómenos como la humedad de los últimos días, “ será mucho peor dentro de unos días “.
La Municipalidad de Junín enumeró que unos 60 techos tuvieron problemas debido a los vientos, también numerosos árboles caídos y hasta una línea de tensión se desplomó cerca del centro de la villa cabecera.
